getModality in interface Connection

the Connection.Modality of this protocol handler.

serviceRequest

public Response serviceRequest(Command cmd,
                               byte[]... args)
                        throws RedisException
Description copied from interface: Connection
A blocking call to service the specified request. This method will return upon the completion of the request response protocol with the connected redis server. Timeouts and related matters are not addressed by this method or the Protocol interface and can (and should) be addressed at the implementation level (for example when creating handler instances using a specification set, including max wait for synchronous response.)

Connection.Modality.Asynchronous handlers must always throw a ClientRuntimeException for this method which violates the contract for Connection.Modality.Asynchronous handlers.

Specified by:
serviceRequest in interface Connection
Returns:
Throws:
RedisException

serviceRequest

public Response serviceRequest(RequestListener requestListener,
                               Command cmd,
                               byte[]... args)
                        throws RedisException,
                               ClientRuntimeException,
                               ProviderException
Description copied from interface: Connection
A non-blocking call to service the specified request. This method will return immediately.

Upon the completion of the request response protocol with the connected redis server, the RequestListener registered in this call will receive a notification. Support for this method is required for all Connection.Modality.Asynchronous

Connection.Modality.Synchronous handlers must always throw a ClientRuntimeException for this method which violates the contract for Connection.Modality.Synchronous handlers.

Specified by:
serviceRequest in interface Connection
Returns:
Throws:
RedisException
ClientRuntimeException
ProviderException
